title: How to See How Many Photos You Have on Your iPhone

steps.title: Open your iPhone's Settings.
steps.content: Open your iPhone's Settings. [1] X Expert Source Linh Le Certified Mobile Repair Specialist Expert Interview. 10 February 2022. This is the gray cog icon located on one of your phone's home screens, or within a folder named "Utilities."

steps.title: Scroll to the third section, and tap General.
steps.content: Scroll to the third section, and tap General . [2] X Expert Source Linh Le Certified Mobile Repair Specialist Expert Interview. 10 February 2022. It's the gray icon with the white cog on it.

steps.title: Review your Photo count.
steps.content: Review your Photo count. The number of photos you have on your iPhone is displayed on the fifth line to the right of the "Photos" heading. Photos that have been received via Messages and photos from your Photo Stream are not included in this count unless you have saved them to your device.
